events.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) for Electric Vehicles
events.wd_label: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) for Electric Vehicles
events.wd_description: NMC cathode batteries are used in electric vehicles, with high energy density and operating voltage.
events.description: NMC cathode batteries are used in electric vehicles, with high energy density and operating voltage.

events.name: Reducing cobalt content
events.wd_description: Reducing the cobalt content in NMC is a target due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost.
events.description: Reducing the cobalt content in NMC is a target due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost.

events.name: Increasing nickel content
events.wd_description: Increasing the nickel content provides more capacity within the stable operation window.
events.description: Increasing the nickel content provides more capacity within the stable operation window.

events.name: Optimizing NMC for EV applications
events.wd_description: Optimizing NMC for electric vehicle applications due to high energy density and operating voltage.
events.description: Optimizing NMC for electric vehicle applications due to high energy density and operating voltage.

events.name: Usage of NMC batteries in electric vehicles
events.wd_label: Usage of NMC batteries in electric vehicles
events.wd_description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries, installed in the BMW ActiveE and BMW i8.
